import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react' import '../App.css' import data from "../data.json" import Image from '../assets/mars.png' function Mars() { let mars = data[3] let active = { background: `#D14C32`, border: 'none' } return (

{mars.name}

{mars.overview.content}

Source: Wikipedia

ROTATION TIME

{mars.rotation}

REVOLUTION TIME

{mars.revolution}

RADIUS

{mars.radius}

AVERAGE TEMP.

{mars.temperature}

); } export default Mars;
